author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE MOVING AWAY FROM THE BIG ISLAND...
summary:
...HONE MOVING AWAY FROM THE BIG ISLAND...
 As of 2:00 PM HST Sun Aug 25
 the center of Hone was located near 18.9, -157.9
 with movement WNW at 14 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 994 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.
